text: @GOPLeader We sure did sir.This coronavirus came out of left field. I think everyone in the world didn't see this coming.I can't wait for it to go away!Now we're more knowledgeable about this sort of thing. We will be more prepared next time with experience on our resume! Prayer Is best 2me
